original_text: The portion of Jacob is not like them: for he is the former of all things; and Israel is the rod of his inheritance: The Lord of hosts is his name.
korean_text: 야곱의 분깃은 이같지 아니하시니 그는 만물의 조성자요 이스라엘은 그의 기업의 지파라 그 이름은 만군의 여호와시니라

sentences.original_text: The portion of Jacob is not like them:
for he is former of all things;
and Israel is rod of his inheritance:
The Lord of hosts is his name.
